_STORE_ROW_ID_AS_INDEPENDENT_FIELD_: Store row ID as independent field
_INPUT_WINDOW_DELETE_MESSAGE_: The following policies are going to be deleted
_INPUT_WINDOW_DELETE_MESSAGE2_: If you do not want to delete these policies, please change first their inputs
_INPUT_ERROR_100_: There was an error. The name of the fragment already exists!
_INPUT_ERROR_101_: There was an error. There is not a fragment whit this ID!
_INPUT_ERROR_200_: There was an error. The name of the policy already exists!
_INPUT_ERROR_201_: There was an error. There is not a policy whit this ID!
_INPUT_ERROR_300_: There was an error. There is not a template whit this name!
_INPUT_ERROR_666_: Server error. There was an error. Please try again later.
_INPUT_ERROR_TEMPLATES_: There was an error while loading the templates! Please try again later.

_POLICY_._DESCRIPTION_INTRO_: Introduce a name and description for your policy. You can also edit the advanced settings of the policy
_POLICY_._INPUTS_INTRO_: You have to select an input from your list to continue configuring the policy. You can only add one input to policy.
_POLICY_._MODEL_INTRO_: You have to create, at least, one model to be able to configure a cube in the next step.
_POLICY_._CUBE_INTRO_: You have to add a cube to the policy and configure, at least, one dimension and one operator with the output fields configured in the model.
_POLICY_._OUTPUTS_INTRO_: You have to select, at least, one output from your list to configure the policy. You can add more than one output to the policy.
_POLICY_._FINISH_INTRO_: The policy has been generated in a JSON format you can see below.
_POLICY_._INPUTS_ERROR_: At least one input must be selected!
_POLICY_._OUTPUTS_ERROR_: At least one output must be selected!
_POLICY_._DESCRIPTION_ERROR_: There was an error. The name of the policy already exists!
_POLICY_._MODEL_ERROR_: There was an error. You must create one model at least!
_POLICY_._CUBE_ERROR_: There was an error. You must create one cube at least and they can not have the same name

_CUBE_._INVALID_DIMENSION_PRECISION_: You have to select a precision for this dimension type
_CUBE_._DIMENSION_NAME_EXISTS_: There is a dimension with this name. Please change it and try it again
_CUBE_._OPERATOR_NAME_EXISTS_: There is an operator with this name. Please change it and try it again
_CUBE_._INVALID_CONFIG_: The JSON introduced in the configuration is not valid

_CUBE_CONFIG_HELP_MESSAGE_: Need help to configure your Cube? Use the Help tab in the upper right of your screen
_CONFIGURATION_INFO_: JSON displayed in the textarea is for reference purposes only and it should be edited to capture the actual fields you are interested in.
_OUTPUT_WINDOW_DELETE_MESSAGE_: This output is being used in the following policies
_OUTPUT_WINDOW_DELETE_MESSAGE2_: If you want to delete this output, please change first the output of the policies
_INTPUT_WINDOW_POLICY_RUNNING_MESSAGE_: There is at least one policy running using this input.
_INTPUT_WINDOW_POLICY_RUNNING_MESSAGE2_: Please stop the following policies first to edit this input:
_OUTTPUT_WINDOW_POLICY_RUNNING_MESSAGE_: There is at least one policy running using this output.
_OUTTPUT_WINDOW_POLICY_RUNNING_MESSAGE2_: Please stop the following policies first to edit this output:
_INTPUT_WINDOW_DELETE_POLICY_RUNNING_MES: Please stop the following policies first to delete this input:
_OUTTPUT_WINDOW_DELETE_POLICY_RUNNING_ME: Please stop the following policies first to delete this output:
_FRAGMENT_WINDOW_EDIT_MESSAGE_: The following policies are going to be modified
_INPUT_WINDOW_EDIT_MESSAGE2_: If you do not want to modify these policies, please change first their input
_OUTPUT_WINDOW_EDIT_MESSAGE2_: If you do not want to modify these policies, please change first their outputs
_GENERIC_FORM_ERROR_: There are some errors in the introduced data. Please, check them and try it again
_ERROR_ALL_FIELDS_REQUIRED_: All fields are required! Please check them and try to sumbit the form.
_INPUT_CREATE_FIRST_ONE_: Click here to create your first input!
_OUTPUT_CREATE_FIRST_ONE_: Click here to create your first output!
_POLICY_CREATE_FIRST_ONE_: Click here to create your first policy!
_RUN_POLICY_KO_: The policy '{{policyName}}' is already running! Please stop it and try again later.
_STOP_POLICY_KO_: The policy '{{policyName}}' is already stopped! Please run it and try again later.
_REMOVE_MODEL_MESSAGE_: If you remove this model, the following cubes will be removed: {{modelList}}
_OUTPUT_INPUT_PLACEHOLDER_: Write an output field name and click in the plus icon to add to the list
_POLICY_ERROR_DELETE_POLICY_: The policy is not stopped! If you want to delete this policy, please stop it first.
_POLICY_ERROR_EDIT_POLICY_: The policy is not stopped! If you want to edit this policy, please stop it first.
_POLICY_CUBE_OPERATOR-DIMENSION_ERROR_: There was an error. At least one operator and one dimension must be created
_POLICY_CUBE_OPERATOR_ERROR_: There was an error. At least one operator must be created
_POLICY_CUBE_DIMENSION_ERROR_: There was an error. At least one dimension must be created
